item.title: Intel NUC as a backend for local development
item.description: A comprehensive story on how I started using Intel NUC as a backend for local (remote possible as well) development, while my code editor (on any machine) is used as a thin client. Table of contents Rationale Hardware Software Initial Disk Network Setup DHCP Wi-Fi CPU Frequency Scaling Usage (wakeonlan, vscode remote ssh) Conclusion Rationale There were 2 problems, using a dedicated machine for development, I thought I might solve.
